displayProperties.description:
This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Decreases projectile speed
displayProperties.name: Confined Launch

displayProperties.description:
Grenades fired from this weapon do increased damage on direct hits.
  •  Increases stability
displayProperties.name: Spike Grenades

displayProperties.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
displayProperties.name: Steady Hands

displayProperties.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
displayProperties.name: One for All

This weapon can fire longer distances.

displayProperties.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.

displayProperties.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.
displayProperties.name: Multikill Clip

  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil

  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
  •  Increases airborne effectiveness

More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.
